meanings.definition: A railway or tramway operating on a cable system, especially one on a steep incline.
meanings.sent1: The funiculars carried passengers up the mountain effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: We rode the funiculars to reach the top of the hill.
meanings.sent3: The funiculars seemed like magical carriages climbing the slope.
meanings.sent4: The funiculars chugged along the tracks like determined ants.
meanings.sent5: The view from the funiculars was breathtaking as we ascended.

meanings.definition: A cable car or other vehicle ascending a steep incline by means of a cable.
meanings.sent1: The funiculars provided a smooth ride up the steep hill.
meanings.sent2: Tourists enjoyed the scenic ride on the funiculars.
meanings.sent3: The funiculars looked like little boxes dangling from a string.
meanings.sent4: The funiculars climbed the slope gracefully, like dancers in motion.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the funiculars moving echoed through the valley.
